## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the [contributing guidelines](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] I've tested my changes locally
- [ ] I've updated documentation if needed
- [ ] My code builds without errors (`npm run build`)
- [ ] All tests pass (`npm test`)
- [ ] No lint warnings (`npm run lint`)

- [ ] I've checked for security implications (no leaked keys, proper input validation)
- [ ] I've added entries to [CHANGELOG.md](../CHANGELOG.md) if applicable
